overlays.idp_delete_info_intro: Please note, all users which are not migrated to the new iDP wii get irreversible deleted.
overlays.idp_delete_success_intro: The window will close automatically. In case it doesn't, please use the “close” button in on the top right.
overlays.idp_delete_error_title: The identity provider did not got deleted.
overlays.idp_delete_error_intro: Please retry or contact an administrator if the failure persist.
overlays.idp_delete_tooltip_info: Please disable the service first or make sure if any one of the service for following company is working.
overlays.idp_status_change_success: Identity Provider {{ name }} was successfully {{ status }}
overlays.idp_status_change_error: The indentity provider was not {{ status }}
overlays.idp_status_change_intro2: Are you sure you want to enable this idp?
overlays.idp_status_change_intro1: Disable the idp will always result into the deactivation, but not deletion. You can always enable it again
overlays.idp_status_tooltip_info: At least one company service needs to enabled
overlays.idp_test_intro2: The IdP is disabled for now and get enabled below.
overlays.idp_test_description: Please note, before enabling the Idp and trying to login, you need to setup the Idp connection on you side as well and connect your CX user to the IdP connection. To enable the same, please fillout the fields below.
overlays.idp_test_step_text2: Setup your own user for the new idp by enhancing your user profile.
overlays.idp_test_step_text4: Run a test via incognito mode of your browser.
overlays.idp_test_username_label: Enter the username inside the new idp
overlays.idp_test_userid_label: Enter the user id inside the new idp
overlays.idp_form_userId_error: Please enter a valid user Id

error.deleteTechUserNotificationErrorDescripti: Please try it later again or contact your administrator.
error.title: Oops, Something went wrong.
error.description: The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request.

registration.title: Welcome back!
registration.mainDescription: You've started your registration but haven't finished yet. Complete all steps to gain limited access to the Cofinity-X Portal while your registration is being reviewed.
registration.description: At the current state of the registration you cannot access the portal. After completing all phases of the registration you will get limited access to the portal while your registration is being reviewed.
registration.helpText: Do you need help? Reach out to us at

registrationInreview.title: Your registration status
registrationInreview.subDescription: Your registration is being reviewed. We’ll send you an e-mail notification once the review is complete. In the meantime, you can track the progress below.
registrationInreview.helperText: If you have any questions regarding your registration reach out to us at <0>support@cofinity-x.com.</0>
registrationInreview.noteDetail: Your registration is being reviewed. Your access to the portal is currently limited. We’ll send you an e-mail notification once the review is complete.
registrationInreview.helpText: If you have any questions regarding your registration reach out to us at

registrationDeclined.title: Registration Status
registrationDeclined.description:
After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that we are unable to approve your registration at this time.

Details/reasons for the cancellation have been provided via email.Your account will get disabled soon.

registration-requests.headersubtitle: The application request board includes all current outstanding application requests as well as an overview of confirmed and declined company applications to the Catena-X Network. If an application is approved, the registration company will receive access to the CX portal to start the technical and functional onboarding. Please make sure that you validate the application request details before approving a request.
registration-requests.introText1: The application request board includes all current outstanding application requests as well as an overview of confirmed and declined company applications to the Catena-X Network.
registration-requests.introText2: If an application is approved, the registration company will receive access to the CX portal to start the technical and functional onboarding. Please make sure that you validate the application request details before approving a request.

overlay.title: Company Registration Details
overlay.companydatadescription: Below you can find the details of the company registration

confirmmodal.title: Confirm action
confirmmodal.description: Are you sure to make action on selected request?

confirmCancelModal.title: Cancel Application Process of {companyName}
confirmCancelModal.description: Are you sure you want to cancel the application process of {companyName}?
confirmCancelModal.details: With confirming the cancellation, the registration company will get informed and the cancellation message added below will be shared.
confirmCancelModal.note: Please note that the cancellation wont allow the company to register again, as long as no new registration is triggered.
confirmCancelModal.error: Please revalidate your input; the message should not start with “=”.

addBpn.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

slider1.title: User Management
slider1.subtitle: Add users to your company account, assign rights, and manage access to subscribed applications.

slider2.title: App Marketplace
slider2.subtitle: Your one-stop shop for interoperable, ready-to-use business applications. Discover Catena-X certified data exchange solutions for key industry use cases.

slider3.title: Service Marketplace
slider3.subtitle: Explore advisory and consultancy services from trusted partners. Achieve your business goals with strategic insights and expert guidance on Catena-X and data exchange.

slider4.title: Connector Registration
slider4.subtitle: Register your connector – whether it's your own or managed – to be fully connected to the dataspace and ready for efficient data exchange.

emptyCards.title: Your subscribed app will appear in this section once respective roles are assigned to you.

stage.title: App Marketplace
stage.subtitle: Explore Catena-X certified apps for key industry use cases. Filter by use cases or browse all products. You can mark favorite apps with a heart and display them in the Your Favorite Apps section.

favoriteSection.title: My Favorite Applications
favoriteSection.noFavoriteDescription: Your app favorites will show up in this section as soon as favorites selected.

appOverviewSection.title: All apps
appOverviewSection.dataLoadFailed: Data Load Failed due to missing permission rights.

semantichub.title: Semantic Data Models
semantichub.introText_0: In Catena-X, the Semantic Hub publishes and manages semantic data models. It allows data and service providers to use and reuse these models efficiently. Each data model is versioned to ensure transparency and control, managing their release status effectively.
semantichub.introText_1: Semantic models are used to structure data. As a concept, they make it  possible to give fundamental meaning to data and their relationships. In  the context of data modeling and data organization they realize the  development of applications as well as the maintenance of data  consistency.

filter.objNamePlaceholder: Enter a object name to filter

deleteDialog.title: Delete aspect model
deleteDialog.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete the aspect model?
deleteDialog.info: Note: If you delete the model now, you won't be able to reactivate it later.

detail.fileError: Error: The file could not be loaded.
detail.ttlTooltip: The downloaded Turtle file looks different but is semantically the same compared to the uploaded Turtle file for the Aspect. To further develop existing Aspects refer to the source Turtle files (e.g. in the Catena-X BAMM Model GitHub Repository)
detail.downloadTitle: Download options related to this aspect model

openApi.inputLabel: Enter a base URL to change the default open API URL.

detail.nomodelText: The used URN is either incorrect or the model does not yet exist.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe Business Application/Service
unsubscribe.checkBoxLabel: I confirm I have read the notice and still wish to unsubscribe from this application/service.
unsubscribe.checkBoxLabelDescription: Unsubscribing cannot be undone. When you unsubscribe, your agreements with third-party providers, including notice periods, still apply.
unsubscribe.unsubscribeError: Unsubscription could not be executed. Please try again or come back later.

organization.title: Your Company
organization.headlineDescription: View your company details and roles in Catena-X. Add site information for Cofinity-X Golden Record Service validation. Successful validated details, including BPNS and site address, will be shared with Business Partner Explorer subscribers for enhanced data quality.

companySubscriptions.title: App & Service Subscriptions
companySubscriptions.description: This is your overview of all applications and services that your company has requested or subscribed to. Here, you can monitor the status of each request and manage the subscriptions.

howtouse.heading: Terms and conditions
howtouse.message: The terms and conditions govern the relationship between the app user and the app provider. The terms and conditions, as well as the data models and further information, can be viewed by clicking on the hyperlinks.

privacy.heading: Privacy policy
privacy.message: The privacy policy specifies which data the business applications collect, handle and process. The details below explicitly show which company/user information is collected/stored.

appOverview.description: Register a new app and manage your current app offerings. Recently changed apps will show on top and in the overview below, you will find apps that have already been published as well as offers that are still being created or have been rejected.
appOverview.title: App Overview

recently.subheader: Here you can find your recently modified apps. Click on an app to view details or continue the release process. The sub-menu on each app card allows you to make changes to active apps. Below the recently changed apps, you will find a list of all apps provided by your company. Scroll down for more details.

confirmModal.title: Change app {appName}
confirmModal.description: Dear user, you have selected an application that's currently in the “In Creation” status. Would you like to access the app release management form for this app? This will allow you to modify and update the data and information associated with the application before it's released.

details.title: Submitted App Details
details.description: The app {appName} is already submitted for review by the network administrator to publish the app on the market place. Till the review is finished, you can not do any changes to the app

deactivate.description: Deactivation of business applications will deactivate the app offer inside the Catena-X marketplace. Any current active subscription will stay active and customers wont be effected by the deactivation. New subscriptions are not possible.
deactivate.checkboxLabel: Hereby I confirm that I have read the business app terms and conditions and that I am deactivating my company business application from the marketplace with immediate effect. I understand that it is not possible to self-reverse the deactivation.
deactivate.checkboxErrorMsg: Please confirm that you have read the deactivation impact above before proceeding

changeImage.description: You can change the cover image for your app here. After saving, the change is immediately updated in the App Card.
changeImage.errorMsg: Unable to change the lead image

changeDescription.description: Here you can change the description texts for your app. After saving, the change is immediately updated on the app details page and in the app card.

addRoles.description: You can add additional roles for your app here. After saving, the change is immediately updated for the app. Note: existing or newly added roles cannot be edited or deleted for a published app.
addRoles.uploadAdditionalRolesDescription: Please download the .CSV template, replace the examples with your roles, and remove any unnecessary content.
addRoles.uploadAdditionalRolesDescriptionNote: Note: Only one file can be uploaded.
addRoles.confirmButtonDescription: When you click Confirm, the new roles will be added to your application and will be available to all active subscribers.

changeDocuments.description: Here you can update your app images and add or remove documents. After saving, the change is immediately updated on the app details page.
changeDocuments.uploadNewDocumentDescription: Note: only one file for upload allowed
changeDocuments.deleteIconTooltip: At least one document is mandatory. Upload a new document before being able to remove the image.
changeDocuments.uploadButtonTooltip: Maximum number of allowed documents reached. Please delete one document before uploading a new one.

columns.name: Connector Name
columns.sdRegistrationToolTip: The Self-Description is triggered. Process might take up to a couple of minutes.

details.heading: Connector Configuration
details.name: Name
details.wantToDeleteConnector: Are you sure you want to delete the registered connector? This action cannot be undone.
details.noteDesc: If you change the URL of the connector, the current SD document becomes invalid and a new one will be created automatically by the system
details.urlErrorMessage: An error has occured. The changes could not be saved. Please try again or come back later
details.apiErrorDesc1: The Connector data can not be loaded at the moment
details.apiErrorDesc2: Please reload the page or try again later
details.apiErrorDesc3: If the problem persists, please contact:
details.featureNotAvailable: This feature is currently not available

configurationDetails.title: Configure Your Connector
configurationDetails.description1: This description provides step-by-step instructions on how to configure your connector.
configurationDetails.description2: Please follow the instructions below to set the necessary configuration values.
configurationDetails.description3: Ensure that you enter the correct values for each configuration setting.
configurationDetails.description4: Once you have set these values, your connector will be properly configured and ready to use.
configurationDetails.description:
This description provides step-by-step instructions on how to configure your connector.
Please follow the instructions below to set the necessary configuration values.
Ensure that you enter the correct values for each configuration setting.
Once you have set these values, your connector will be properly configured and ready to use.
configurationDetails.clientId: Client ID of your technical user

section.text1: *iatp.sts.oauth.token_url: the token endpoint of the decentral identity management instance.
section.text2: *iatp.sts.oauth.client.id: technical user client ID of your technical user for the specific connector.
section.text3: Ensure you separate the technical users - each connector one technical user.
section.text4: *iatp.sts.oauth.client.secret_alias: alias under which you saved your DIM client
section.text5: secret in the vault. Inside the vault the secret of the technical user defined above should be stored.
section.text6: *iatp.sts.dim.url: base url of you decentral identity management instance.

edcconnector.desc: The connector combines the benefits of IDS connectors (secure and standardized communication, data usage control) with the interoperability. To register your connector inside the network and create your connector self-description, please register your connector below.
edcconnector.imagetext: The connector combines the benefits of IDS connectors (secure and standardized communication, data usage control) with the interoperability. To register your connector inside the network and create your connector self-description, please register your connector below.

deletemodal.title: Delete Connector
deletemodal.description: Are you sure you want to delete the registered connector? This action cannot be undone.
deletemodal.techUserdescription: Are you sure you want to delete the connector? It will be removed from the 'connector discovery' endpoint and the self-description document will be set to inactive. The associated technical user will also be immediately deactivated.
deletemodal.techUserCheckBoxLabel: Yes, I want to deactivate the connector, which will also delete the technical user.

modal.title: Register connector
modal.intro: Registration of a company connector which is implemented in your own company network.

company.title: Register Company Connector
company.intro: To be able to communicate with your connector inside the dataspace, the connector endpoint needs to get registered. For the connector, a technical user is mandatorily needed. This user is used to enable the communication between your connector and the company wallet (identity management). If the technical user is not created already, please create the technical user first and proceed with the connector registration afterwards. Note, the technical user creation is a asynchrony process and might take up to 5 minutes.
company.disableDescription: This option is only available if your company is Active Participant. Company roles can get changed by the company admin /company-role

managed.title: Register Managed Connector
managed.intro: Register a managed connector of your customer / 3rd party provided. This selection is mainly service provider relevant, which offers managed connectors to data provider/consumer.
managed.disableDescription: This option is only available if your company is App Provider or Service Provider. Company roles can get changed by the company admin /company-role

modal.connectAlreadyExistingTechnicalUser: Connect an already existing technical user
modal.createNewTechnicalUserDescription: Create a new technical user from the Technical User Management page or by clicking the button below. Please note that the technical user creation process may take up to 5 minutes before the user is ready for Connector Registration.

name.label: Name*
name.tooltipMsg: Own selected connector name for verification
name.patternError: Connector name can not start with special character or empty space. Allowed special characters are @_:;.-%&?,'!.

url.label: Connector Catalogue Endpoint*
url.patternError: Enter a valid url - eg: https://catena-x.net
url.tooltipMsg: URL of the connector endpoint. Only https:// endpoints are allowed

bpn.label: Connector Owner*
bpn.error: BPN is mandatory. Valid BPN eg: BPNL+12 characters
bpn.tooltipMsg: BPN of the company in which name the connector will be used to generate data offers or consume data

country.label: Location*
country.tooltipMsg: Connector Location Country Code - e.g. DE, US, etc.

doc.label: Public Authentication Key/Certificate*
doc.error: Please use a valid type. E.g. .pem; .cert
doc.tooltipMsg: Upload the certificate that contains your connector's public key information.

UserName.label: Username*
UserName.patternError: Username should start with a letter. Allowed special characters are #. '!=()&” along with numbers and spaces

description.label: Description*
description.patternError: Username should start with a letter. Allowed special characters are #. '!=()&” along with numbers and spaces

create.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

delete.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

partnernetwork.headerDescription: Your overview of your partners within the Catena-X network.
partnernetwork.membershipnotificationdescription: Please note that the membership information might be incorrect.

invite.headlineDescription: Invite a new partner to join Cofinity-X by using the  the registration application invite process.
invite.headerIntro: Add the business partner registration contact and company name below.
invite.inviteText2: Invite a new partner to Catena-X.
invite.successSubText: The window should close automatically. If it doesn't, please use the “Close” button at the top right.
invite.failure: Error - Business Partner was not invited
invite.failureSubText: An error occured. Please try it again later.

provisionIdp.title: Setup your company IDP
provisionIdp.success: Your identity provider was provisioned successfully

usermanagement.title: User Management
usermanagement.description: View and manage all users assigned to the company. Assign roles; create new user accounts and create technical users.

apparea.headline: App Access Management
apparea.appsNotAvailable: Apps will be available as soon as business applications are subscribed and activated

table.headline: Portal User Management
table.title: User List
table.noRowsMsg: No users without assigned roles available. All users have at least one app role assigned.

header.title: App Roles
header.subtitle: Below you can find an overview of the available app roles as well as a role description by selectiong the “Role Description” field. To add the user role to an existing active company user, please use the “add role” button below the “Available Role” area.
header.noRoles: No app roles are currently existing. No assignment possible.
header.noPermission: Your current role doesn’t allow you to add or change user roles. If you think you need access, please reach out to your administrator for assistance

table.headline: Identity Management
table.title: App Users
table.buttonTooltip: Function disabled since no app roles are available
table.noRowsMsg: No users assigned till now. Start to assign by clicking on Add Role

editRoles.title: Manage roles for
editRoles.subtitle: Please select additional roles for the app or unselect any role which should get unassigned.

addUsers.error: We are sorry, it seems there's an issue with the identity call which blocks any further action on this function. Please try it later again. If the problem persist, consider to reach out to the platform administrator.

addMultipleUsers.heading: Add user account by bulk upload

step1.heading: Download this upload template by clicking the icon

step2.heading: Enter user data in upload form
step2.linkText: Guide on how to fill the template

step3.heading: Upload form by selecting the form file with the user data

addMultipleUsers.fileSizeError: Uploaded file is too big. Maximum 100KB is allowed
addMultipleUsers.fileHeaderError: Bulk Upload list format wrong. Missing or incorrect header line. Recheck the download file to retrieve the expected format

uploadedFile.addUserRolesHeading: Add user roles for all users in bulk upload:
uploadedFile.note1: Only assign roles that apply to all users in the bulk upload file - individual roles can be applied individually later.
uploadedFile.note2: Roles for applications can be assigned after the user(s) have been successfully created.
uploadedFile.note3: We suggest to assign CX User initially to all bulk uploaded users and set specific user permissions separately.

success.errorUsersLabel:
Errors have occured for the following usernames:
Please check their entries in the upload file and try upload it again.

error.description: The upload failed due to technical issue. Please try it later once again or contact your administrator.

technicalUser.headline: Technical user management {{company}}
technicalUser.descriptionText: The technical user is an identity that a company can use to connect to CX backend services without continuous disconnection. For example, a run-as technical user is required for connecting to the digital twin registry or the semantic model.
technicalUser.shortDescriptionText: Please use the action button to request a new technical user with the roles as per your need. Or manage already existing technical users in the table below.
technicalUser.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete technical user {{ user }}?
technicalUser.noteDeleteUser: Note: The deletion will be permanently. It is not possible the reactive the user again.
technicalUser.confirmDeleteNotificationDescription: The action can not be reversed. Please create a new user in case it's needed

technicalUserDetails.heading: Technical User Details
technicalUserDetails.shortDescriptionText: You will probably prefer to use your own company IDP and you can create and manage the federation on this page. On registration we have created an IDP with one user entry for the admin.

deleteUserConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the user account of {userName}?
deleteUserConfirm.description: By deleting the account, the access of this user to Catena-X as well as any rights and data access will get revoked.
deleteUserConfirm.note: Note: If you delete the account now, you wont be able to reactivate it later.
deleteUserConfirm.successDescription: The user got successfully deleted. All rights have been disabled. Please note that the user might still be able to use the application for the next 10 minutes. Latest in 10 minutes the user is automatically logged out and a new login attempt will get declined
deleteUserConfirm.errorDescription: Your user couldn't get deleted. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

suspendUserConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to suspend the user account of {userName}?
suspendUserConfirm.description: By suspending the account, the access of this user to Catena-X as well as any permissions and data accesses will get deactivated temporarily.
suspendUserConfirm.note: Note: Suspended accounts can get reactivated anytime.
suspendUserConfirm.successDescription: The user is successfully suspended and all rights are disabled.
suspendUserConfirm.errorDescription: Your user couldn't get suspended. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

resetPasswordConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to reset the password?
resetPasswordConfirm.note: The user {userName} will receive an email to reset the password.
resetPasswordConfirm.successDescription: The password reset request got send to {userName}.
resetPasswordConfirm.errorDescription: The password reset was unsuccessful. Please try it later again or contact the administrator.

deleteOwnUserConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this user account?
deleteOwnUserConfirm.description: By deleting the account, the access of this user to Catena-X as well as any rights and data access will get revoked.
deleteOwnUserConfirm.note: Note: If you delete the account now, you wont be able to reactivate it later.
deleteOwnUserConfirm.successDescription: Your user got successfully deleted, you will get disconnected within the following 5 seconds.
deleteOwnUserConfirm.errorDescription: Your user couldn't get deleted. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

idpmanagement.addIdpSubheadline: Enter an IdP name and choose the idp type to start the configuration
idpmanagement.updateIdpSubheadline:
Configure your idp connection. Retrieve the metadata config file from your local idp and upload the same in the input field below. Additionally the client_id and secret are needed.
Follow the
idpmanagement.updateIdpSubheadline2: to find a number of examples of local idp's such as Azure, Keycloak, etc.
idpmanagement.enableIdpSubheadline: This will open another option for people from your company to sign.
idpmanagement.enableIdpSuccessSubheadline: Go and test the login now
idpmanagement.disableIdpSubheadline: This will remove the option to sign in for people of your company
idpmanagement.description: Here you can manage how the users of your company authenticate with Catena-X. On registration we have created an IDP with one user entry for the admin (that's probably you ;). Many companies already have their own IDP where users authenticate using their known company user id and a familiar login mask. In this case you will probably prefer to use your own company IDP and you can create and manage the federation on this page.

idpdetail.title: Identity Provider Details
idpdetail.selectIpsText: Select the type of IdP which should get newly created
idpdetail.addMetaDataText: Add your metadata URL here, to automatically setup all the idp integration relevant metadata. When clicking, load. then metadata file is getting loaded and respective values will show up below.
idpdetail.idp_meta_description: Add your metadata URL here, to automatically setup all the idp integration relevant metadata. When clicking, Load then metadata file is getting loaded and respective values will show up below.

addUser.headline: Add User Account
addUser.subheadline: Add a new user account by adding the user first and last name as well as the email address. Below the input fields select the respective user roles which the user should have. One role is minimum needed to enable the user to access the network.
addUser.multipleUserHeadline: Add multiple users by file upload:
addUser.multipleUserSubheadline: Please use this <1>upload template</1>, to add multiple users via the bulk load.
addUser.technicalUserSubheadline: Create a technical user by adding the relevant information requested below. Please note that the description is used for your own reference only. In case you have a number of technical users it will help you to differenciate between the technical user accounts.
addUser.technicalUserSubheadlineSuccess: Technical user successfully created. Below are the details needed for service connection. Please keep this secret confidential.
addUser.technicalUserSubheadlineError: Something went wrong. The technical user did not got created due to a system error. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.
addUser.helperText: Please enter all required information before proceeding.

addOverlay.serviceSubHeading: Select one of the following service roles:
addOverlay.name: Username
addOverlay.note: Note: Selection of both internal and external users for the same service is not possible.
addOverlay.externalUserRolesDescription: External technical user profile are created in external environment therefore can only have one role
addOverlay.internalUserRolesDescription: This selection includes all roles that can be added to a technical user profile. The technical users created from this profile will  be visible to the customer and provider!
addOverlay.internalUserRolesOnlyVisible: Internal technical user profile (visible only to providers)
addOverlay.userDetailsNotVisible: Technical user details won't be visible to the subscribing customers
addOverlay.internalUserRolesDescriptionOnlyVisible: Internal technical user profile are created in the direct environment of the portal therefore can have multiple roles

addUserRight.headline: Add Roles for multiple users
addUserRight.selectUsersDescription: In Step 1, select the users to assign the app roles to and confirm by clicking the button at the bottom. In Step 2, choose the roles for the selected users.
addUserRight.addRolesDescription: In Step 1, select the users to assign the app roles to and confirm by clicking the button at the bottom. In Step 2, choose the roles for the selected users

account.headlineDescription: Manage your personal data and determine what information others can see as well as what apps you can access.
account.resetPswrdMaxLimitError: The maximum amount of errors is triggered already. Please try it later again
account.resetPswrdUnsuccessfulError: The password reset was unsuccessful. An issue occurred. Please try It later again
account.resetPswrdPermissionsError: Reset of the password was unsuccessful due to missing permissions.

editRoles.title: Manage User Assigned Portal Role(s)
editRoles.subtitle: Please choose additional roles for the user or deselect any role to unassign. At least one role must be selected.
editRoles.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

footer.copyright: Copyright © Cofinity-X GmbH – All rights reserved.

logout.message: We are logging you out now... Hope to see you again soon!

notfound.message: The content could not be found. This can happen because of various reasons - either
notfound.title: Something went wrong.
notfound.description: You don't have access to this page or the page doesn't exist. Please contact your admin.

reason.nopermission: you have no permission to view this content or
reason.notexisting: the page doesn't exist in the Catena-X portal or

notfound.further: If you think there should be content please contact your administrator.

privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.message: The Privacy Policy states which data the business applications collects, handles and processes. The details below explicitly show which company / user information are getting collected/stored.

document.heading: Documents
document.conformityDocumentsDescription: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

howtouse.heading: Documents
howtouse.message: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

providerInformation.heading: Provider Information
providerInformation.message: If you have any question, want to get in contact or visit the provider website, you can find all necessary information below.

technicalUserSetup.heading: Technical User Setup
technicalUserSetup.message: The technical user profile defined below displays the user permission which the technical user created as part of the app/service activation gets automatically assigned.

appdetail.pendingTooltip: Application subscription is pending. The app provider is informed
appdetail.subscribedTooltip: The app is already subscribed by your company

apprelease.headerDescription: Register your app to get published on the marketplace. You can find a quick overview of the app release process below.
apprelease.descHeading: Publish your company app inside the Catena-X marketplace
apprelease.descMessage: Register and publish your company apps on the Cofinity-X marketplace or go to “Your Apps” to manage your created offerings.

stepperHeadline.validateAndPublish: Verify Data and Submit Your App

stepperDescription.appMarketCard: Create your “App Card” for the marketplace. This card is your first touchpoint with customers and will show the basic information of your offering, like title, description, language settings, pricing etc.
stepperDescription.appPage: Provide detailed information for your app’s detail page, including a long description in English and German, images, several documents, provider details and privacy information.
stepperDescription.contractAndConsent: To publish your offer as a Catena-X Certified App on the marketplace, you need to accept the T&Cs and guidelines and upload your Conformity Certificate.
stepperDescription.technicalIntegration: Add user roles by uploading them as CSV file. If your app requires technical integration, select the respective technical user(s). Otherwise, choose “None” and proceed.
stepperDescription.betaTest: This step is currently not available and can be skipped.
stepperDescription.validateAndPublish: Review the summary of all your app registration inputs. We will validate your app registration shortly after the app submission.

appMarketCard.headerDescription: The following input fields and uploads are used to create your “App Card” which will be placed inside the marketplace. The app card is the first touchpoint with the customer.
appMarketCard.defaultCardShortDescriptionEN: [short description EN] this section will get replaced with your app short description
appMarketCard.salesManagerDescription: Please select your Sales manager via the dropdown below. The sales manager can only get set if a user of your company has the respective portal role (Sales Manager). The sales manager will get informed as soon as a app subscribtion request is triggered by the customer.
appMarketCard.pricingInformation: Pricing Information (e.g. free / charged (to be defined))

appPage.headerDescription: Fill out your app details page. On the marketplace the following added information will be public available for customers to get a extended view of your application supported functions as well as necessary details regarding security, architecture, etc.
appPage.pleaseEnterValidHomePageURL: Please enter a valid url - eg: https://catena-x.net
appPage.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid Customer Contact E-Mail
appPage.pleaseEnterValidContact: Please enter a valid contact number in one of the following formats: '+xx xxxxxxxxxx' or '+xxxxxxxxxx'. Note: Avoid double spaces or special characters.
appPage.privacyInformationDescription: The privacy information is used to display data types the app may collect on the app detail page. You may select several options OR select “none”.
appPage.privacyInfoError: Error - values couldn't get fetched. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

contractAndConsent.headerDescription: To publish your offer as a Catena-X Certified App on the marketplace, you need to accept the T&Cs and guidelines and upload your Conformity Certificate.

technicalIntegration.headerDescription: Integrate your app with the Catena-X dataspace. For the integration you need to upload the application supported roles as well as the necessary technical user profile which is needed to run your application inside the network. Please note: in this step you are only setting the frame of the authentication - no users are going to get created. Upload all app roles by using the available upload template (csv) file added attached.
technicalIntegration.step1HeaderDescription: Upload your application roles which can get assigned to user identities to be able to access the application.
technicalIntegration.step2HeaderDescription: Setup the technical profile of a technical user/service account of needed permissions to be able to run the application inside the dataspace.
technicalIntegration.uploadRolesDescription: Upload all app roles by using the available upload template (csv) file added attached
technicalIntegration.step3HeaderDescription: [copy] How-To-Text -> Lorem ipsum sapientem ne neque dolor erat,eros solet invidunt duo Quisque aliquid leo. Pretium patrioque sociis eu nihil Cum enim ad, ipsum alii vidisse justo id. Option porttitor diam voluptua. Cu Eam augue dolor dolores quis,
technicalIntegration.step4Header: 4. Get Test Users to Test Integration
technicalIntegration.step4HeaderDescription: [copy] Lorem ipsum sapientem ne neque dolor erat,eros solet invidunt duo Quisque aliquid leo. Pretium patrioque sociis eu nihil Cum enim ad, ipsum alii vidisse justo id. Option porttitor diam voluptua. Cu Eam augue dolor dolores quis,
technicalIntegration.incorrectCSVFileFormat: CSV file formatting incorrect. Please recheck the columns inside the csv
technicalIntegration.deleteOverlayContent: Deletion will not be reversable, do you still want to delete?
technicalIntegration.technicalUserSetupMandatory: Please select at least one technical user setup
technicalIntegration.technicalUserProfileError: Error while updating technical user profiles
technicalIntegration.technicalUserProfileDeleteError: Error while deleting technical user profile
technicalIntegration.noneOption: none (no technical user needed to run the app/service)
technicalIntegration.noRolesLoaded: Currently no roles loaded for app ({{appName}})

form.title: Configure Technical User Profile
form.intro: Select internal or external roles and continue to configure technical user profile
form.internalUserRolesDescription: This selection includes all roles that can be added to a technical user profile. The technical users created from this profile will  be visible to the customer and provider!
form.internalUserRolesOnlyVisible: Internal technical user profile (visible only to providers)
form.internalUserRolesDescriptionOnlyVisible: Internal technical user profile are created in the direct environment of the portal therefore can have multiple roles
form.externalUserRolesDescription: External technical user profile are created in external environment therefore can only have one role
form.userDetailsNotVisible: Technical user details won't be visible to the subscribing customers

deleteOverlay.title: Delete technical user profile
deleteOverlay.description: Are you sure you want to delete selected technical user profile?

betaTest.headerDescription: The beta tests are currently not available. Please proceed to the next step. As soon as the tests are released, we will share them with you to enable app specific beta tests before the official app release.

validateAndPublish.headerDescription: Below you can find a summary of all your app registration inputs. Please check your entered data carefully before sending the app for release. We will validate your app registration shortly after the app submission.

submit.headerTitle: Thank you for submitting the app!
submit.headerDescription: After a review by a Cofinity-X administrator, you will receive
submit.headerDescriptionComplete: further information on the app release.

appReleaseForm.OnlyOneFileAllowed: Only one file for upload allowed
appReleaseForm.fileSizeError: Uploaded file is too big. Maximum 1MB is allowed

retryOverlay.title: Something went wrong
retryOverlay.description: The data could not get loaded, please try it again or go back to the previous page.

serviceMarketplace.title: Service Marketplace
serviceMarketplace.description: Explore various consulting services from qualified partners. Here you will find expert advice on Catena-X and efficient data exchange. Make the most of the data space to achieve your business goals.
serviceMarketplace.headline: Service Subscription
serviceMarketplace.desc1: By selecting “Confirm” below, you will promptly notify the service provider of your interest in their service, and they will commence the subscription procedure. Should the provider require further details to proceed, they will reach out to you directly.
serviceMarketplace.desc2: Once all necessary information has been confirmed and any queries resolved, the service provider will proceed to activate your service tenant. You will receive a notification to guide you through any subsequent steps required on your part.
serviceMarketplace.desc4: By confirming the subscription request, you authorize the transfer of your business partner data, which includes your company name, Business Partner Number (BPN), address, etc., to the service provider. Additionally, your email address will be shared to facilitate communication should further information be needed.
serviceMarketplace.desc6: We are pleased to inform you that the subscription process got successfully triggered.
serviceMarketplace.desc7: The provider is informed about your interest and may contact you shortly.
serviceMarketplace.desc8: The entire process is expected to complete within 5 business days.
serviceMarketplace.desc9: Thank you for choosing the service.
serviceMarketplace.subscriptionHeading: >> there are already active subscriptions for the service {serviceName}
serviceMarketplace.dataLoadFailed: Data Load Failed due to missing permission rights.

document.heading: Relevant Documents
document.message: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

serviceMarketplace.errorMessage: The subscription was unsuccessful; please contact your administrator.

appMarketplace.headline: Business Application Subscription
appMarketplace.desc1: By selecting “Confirm” below, you will promptly notify the app provider of your interest in their service, and they will commence the subscription procedure. Should the provider require further details to proceed, they will reach out to you directly.
appMarketplace.desc2: Once all necessary information has been confirmed and any queries resolved, the app provider will proceed to activate your app tenant. You will receive a notification to guide you through any subsequent steps required on your part.
appMarketplace.desc4: By confirming the subscription request, you authorize the transfer of your business partner data, which includes your company name, Business Partner Number (BPN), address, etc., to the app provider. Additionally, your email address will be shared to facilitate communication should further information be needed.
appMarketplace.desc6: We are pleased to inform you that the subscription process got successfully triggered.
appMarketplace.desc7: The provider is informed about your interest and may contact you shortly.
appMarketplace.statusHeading: For a better transparency, the subscription status bar will be available in the app detail page - you can check the subscription status when opening the app detail page from the app marketplace.
appMarketplace.desc8: The entire process is expected to complete within 5 business days.
appMarketplace.desc9: Thank you for choosing the service.
appMarketplace.errorMessage: The subscription was unsuccessful; please contact your administrator.

appSubscription.headline: App Subscription
appSubscription.headlineDescription: Manage and oversee customer subscriptions to your published apps on the marketplace.
appSubscription.description: Do you want to use the auto-setup instead? Connect your service to automate marketplace subscription build.
appSubscription.subscriptionHeading: >> there are already active subscriptions for the service {serviceName}

document.heading: Relevant Documents
document.message: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

register.heading: Configuration Autosetup URL
register.message: The company autosetup URL configuration feature allows operators to set up a custom URL that will be used to automatically submit subscription requests to the service provider when app subscriptions are triggered on the marketplace. This feature also enables operators to retrieve technical configuration elements and activate the subscription.
register.providerErrorMessage: Something went wrong! Please try it later again.

activation.heading: Activate App Subscription
activation.description: Activate the app subscription request of the customer by adding your customer specific app endpoint/url in the input field below. We will use the url to register/activate the app authentication with the CX idp. Additionally you will receive a technical user which can get used to connect the app tenant/connector to the centryl CX components/services (where needed).
activation.stepDescription: In order to activate the subscription of {{companyName}}, follow the steps below.
activation.step2: System - technical user will get automatically generated and credentials getting shared
activation.step3: Configure your app with the specific technical user to ensure that the app is fully usable.
activation.addTentalURLDescription: The tenant url of the app is the customer specific url which the customer has to access to receive access to the application. Please note: only https:// addresses are allowed.
activation.technicalUserDetailsDescription: Below the technical user profile used to create the technical user for the app tenant is shared. With clicking on “Confirm” below, the technical user is getting created with the respective configured permissions. Please note the technical user is customer specific.
activation.successDescription: The app subscription got successfully activated, the customer got informed via email about the app activation. Please find the technical user details below:

decline.heading: Decline {{subscriptionType}} subscription?
decline.description: {{companyName}} receives an e-mail notification with the option to re-subscribe again.

detailOverlay.title: Provider View
detailOverlay.appIdInfo: The client-id is crucial for OAuth2/OpenID Connect interactions. This identifier is sent as the client-id parameter in requests to the authorization server. It's used for client identification. With the subscription activation, the client id is getting created.
detailOverlay.technicalNameInfo: Technical user name of the technical user/service account created for the specific app subscription. You can click on the technical user name to retrieve client id and secret details.
detailOverlay.technicalPermissionInfo: Permissions assigned to the technical user.
detailOverlay.helpText: For any questions regarding these change(s), please contact:

trustedIssuer.label: Trusted Issuer
trustedIssuer.description: The trusted issuer responsible for issuing the identity credentials.

participantId.label: Participant ID
participantId.description: The unique identifier of the participant in the external system.

iatpId.label: IATP ID
iatpId.description: The unique identifier of the IATP (Identity and Trust Protocol).

didResolver.label: DID Resolver
didResolver.description: The URL of the DID (Decentralized Identifier) resolver used for resolving decentralized identities.

decentralIdentityManagementAuthUrl.label: Decentralized Identity Management Auth URL
decentralIdentityManagementAuthUrl.description: The URL of the authentication endpoint for the decentralized identity management.

decentralIdentityManagementServiceUrl.label: Decentralized Identity Management Service URL
decentralIdentityManagementServiceUrl.description: The URL of the service endpoint for the decentralized identity management.

adminBoard.headerDescription: All the requested applications will be managed from this page.
adminBoard.search: Search by company name / app title

declineModal.title: Reject App Release Request {appName}
declineModal.subheading: Are you sure you want to reject the app release request ?
declineModal.declineReason1Label: Create a notification & email message to inform the app provider/manager about the rejection
declineModal.declineReason2Label: An individual message with additional details can get shared by adding the details into the input field below
declineModal.declineReason3Label: The app will get set back to the status “in progress“

connectedData.heading: Connected Data
connectedData.message: Following data might be used/stored by the app provider to enable you to use the complete functionality of the app.
connectedData.message2: When using the app, the following data may be collected:

Documents.heading: Documents
Documents.message: In the following section additional documents/information are shared by the app provider. Click on the document name to download them.

roles.heading: App Roles
roles.message: Business application roles and description configured/loaded for the respective app. The roles are used to provide app customers user specific access and restrict permissions between different user groups.
roles.roleDescription: The role description is expected to get displayed here in future.

technicalUserSetup.heading: Technical User Setup
technicalUserSetup.message: The technical user profile defined below displays the user permission which the technical user created as part of the app/service activation gets automatically assigned.
technicalUserSetup.roleDescription: The role description is expected to get displayed here in future.

providerInformation.heading: Provider Information
providerInformation.message: If you have any question, want to get in contact or visit the provider website, you can find all necessary information below.

checklistOverlay.resolveTitle: Your option to resolve the issue

REGISTRATION_VERIFICATION.stepDescription: Manual validation of the company registration by the operator. Please check the company details as well as uploaded documents and “accept” / “decline” the application; depending on the validation results
REGISTRATION_VERIFICATION.additionalText: By declining the application; the registration company will not be able to proceed; a new registration will be needed.

TO_DO.title: Your action is needed to resolve the issue
TO_DO.description: Validate the company registration data and the uploaded documents and confirm or reject the registration. Further process steps are only carried out after confirmation.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: No action needed from your side
FAILED.description: The registration company got informed about the declined registration form. A new application is needed if you want to proceed.

BUSINESS_PARTNER_NUMBER.stepDescription: Each registration company need to have a business partner number created. In this step the creation of the bpdm is triggered against the bpdm data pool.

TO_DO.title: No action needed from your side
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: Your action is needed.
FAILED.description: The BPN creation was unsuccessful. You can retrigger the endpoint or close/reject the company registration.

IDENTITY_WALLET.stepDescription: With successful business partner number creation as well as the manual validation of the company registration data; the managed identity wallet is getting generated for the participant.

TO_DO.title: No action needed from your side
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side
IN_PROGRESS.description: The process is currently running/in progress. As soon as the Wallet is created, the status will get automatically updated.

DONE.title: No action needed from your side
DONE.description: The process is successfully completed. The Managed Identity Wallet got created.

FAILED.title: Your action is needed.
FAILED.description: The Identity Wallet creation failed. You can retrigger the endpoint or close/reject the company registration.

BPNL_CREDENTIAL.stepDescription: Manual validation of the company registration by the operator. Please check the company details as well as uploaded documents and “accept” / “decline” the application; depending on the validation results

TO_DO.title: Your action is needed to resolve the issue
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: No action needed from your side
FAILED.description: The BPNL Credential creation failed. You can retrigger the endpoint or close/reject the company registration.

MEMBERSHIP_CREDENTIAL.stepDescription: Manual validation of the company registration by the operator. Please check the company details as well as uploaded documents and “accept” / “decline” the application; depending on the validation results

TO_DO.title: Your action is needed to resolve the issue
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: No action needed from your side
FAILED.description: The Membership Credential creation failed. You can retrigger the endpoint or close/reject the company registration.

CLEARING_HOUSE.stepDescription: Gaia-X Clearinghouse provider is validating the company registration form (company name; address and unique identifier) and after successful validation verified credentials are added to the managed wallet of the customer.

TO_DO.title: No action needed from your side
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: Your action is needed.
FAILED.description: The clearinghouse check was unsuccessful/failed. Details regarding the unsuccessful validation run may get found above. You can retrigger the endpoint (by resetting the status) or close/reject the company registration.

SELF_DESCRIPTION_LP.stepDescription: Legal person / company Self Description is created by the SD Factory and signed and send back by the clearinghouse. The process might take a while since its an asyncron interface.

TO_DO.title: No action needed from your side
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: Your action is needed.
FAILED.description: The self-description creation was unsuccessful. Details regarding the unsuccessful process can get found below. Additionally you can retrigger the endpoint (by resetting the status) or close/reject the company registration.

SKIPPED.title: No action needed from your side
SKIPPED.description: The self-description creation was skipped on purpose. This process will be retriggered by the CX Operator as soon as possible.

roleDetails.heading: Overview of the available Portal roles

companyRolesUpdate.heading: Change Company Role
companyRolesUpdate.description: Below you can manage the roles your company takes in Catena-X.
companyRolesUpdate.step1: You can change your current role by selecting and deselecting the resepctive available roles.
companyRolesUpdate.step2: If you already have more than one role to your company assigned, you can deselect roles. At least one role must always be assigned to your company.
companyRolesUpdate.step3: You can add a new role to your existing role by selecting one or more of the other available roles.
companyRolesUpdate.noteDetail: Changing the role affects the roles, rights, and functions available to your organization in the portal. You will see the impact of your changes before you make final changes to the role(s).
companyRolesUpdate.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try it later again.

overlay.title: Do you really want to change your company's role(s) within Cantena-X?
overlay.description: The section below provides a brief explanation of how your selected changes in your company role may impact your views; functions and individual user rights.
overlay.selectedRolesTitle: You have selected the following changes to your company's role profile:
overlay.changeRolesHeading: The change of your company role has the following consequences:
overlay.termsHeading: Please agree to the following terms & conditions for the new company role profile:

usecaseParticipation.headerDescription: Below you can manage your use case participation in Catena-X. Please note: the selection of the use case participation is relevant for data provider and data consumer.
usecaseParticipation.heading: Use Case Participation
usecaseParticipation.description:
Below you can manage your use case participation in Catena-X.
Please note - the selection of the usecase participatiance is relevant for data provider and data consumer.
usecaseParticipation.step1: You can view your current signed use case participation
usecaseParticipation.step2: You can sign additional use cases by selecting the document download, signing the document and upload the same
usecaseParticipation.noteDetail: Use case participation revocation is currently not enabled. Please contact the platform owner for support.

editUsecase.title: Request new credential
editUsecase.description: Once you accept the framework and submit your request, your credential will be added to your wallet seamlessly. You're then ready to exchange data with fellow dataspace participants.
editUsecase.fileSizeError: Please upload only pdf file upto 2 MB.
editUsecase.checkboxLabel: I have read and accept the <1>framework agreement</1>.
editUsecase.CredentialAlreadyExistsError: Credential already exists and is active
editUsecase.success: Usecase document upload has been done successfully.

certificates.heading: Company Certificates
certificates.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .
certificates.noUploadMessage: No certificates available. All supported certificates are requested or active for your company.

updateCertificate.title: Upload new certificate
updateCertificate.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard .Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
updateCertificate.note: Please upload only pdf files with maximum 2 MB.

successCertificate.title: Certificate successfully uploaded.
successCertificate.queryDescription: For any queries regarding these change(s), please contact the Catena-X helpdesk:

certificates.noData: Currently there are no certificates for the company. You can start uploading a certificate by clicking the “Upload Certificate” button above.

companyCertificate.heading: Company Certificates
companyCertificate.description: Efficiently manage and organize your company certificates with ease. This page provides a user-friendly interface to view, add, edit, and delete company certificates. Stay on top of your certificate management process and ensure compliance effortlessly.

upload.title: Upload new certificate
upload.description: Select the certificate flow and upload your company certificate below. Please note - you are responsible for the certificate validity - only upload valid and official documents.
upload.successDescription: The upload was successful. The document is now available under your company certificate management page as well as shared with all dataspace providers.

confirm.success: The certificate {{name}} has been successfully deleted and moved to “Inactive”
confirm.error: The deletion was not successful. System Message: {{error}} Please contact an administrator.
confirm.title: {{name}} Deletion
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete the certificate. Please note that the certificate deletion is immediately active. A re-activation is not possible; but you can upload a new file under the same type whenever needed.

companyCertificate.noData: Currently there are no certificates for the company. You can start uploading a certificate by clicking the “Upload Certificate” button above.

tooltips.warning: Certificate is exprired or about to expire

adminCertificate.headline: Credential Request Overview
adminCertificate.headlineDescription: The credential admin board enables the administrator to view credential requests and approve/reject them.
adminCertificate.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please contact your administrator.

revokeOverlay.title: Revoke Credential
revokeOverlay.description: Revoking a credential cannot be undone.
revokeOverlay.subDesc: Do you want to revoke the credential:
revokeOverlay.success: The customer credential revocation has been successfully processed. With the successful revocation the credential is no longer valid. Note once a credential is revoked, the action cannot be undone, and the credential will no longer be recognized as valid.
revokeOverlay.error: The revocation of the credential was unsuccessful. An error occurred. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact the site administrator

companyWallet.heading: Company Wallet
companyWallet.description: The wallet stores your secure identity and issued verifiable credentials like your Membership and BPN credentials. This enables participants on the  Catena-X network to confirm your identity as a foundation to exchange data with you.
companyWallet.inactiveDescription: You have not activated your Catena-X wallet.

subnavigation.title: Wallet operations :
subnavigation.button1description: To request a new credential, you must accept the framework agreement. <0/>Please review the terms carefully before proceeding.
subnavigation.button3: Get more details of VCs (coming soon)

credentialType.DATA_EXCHANGE_GOVERNANCE_CREDENTIAL:
DataExchangeGovernance
DataExchangeGovernance credentials are being used to enable cross-company connector communication and data negotiation.

confirmOverlay.title: Deactivate Credential?
confirmOverlay.description: Are you sure you want to deactivate this credential?<0/>This cannot be reversed. <0/>If you continue, you'll need to request this credential again.

successOverlay.title: Credential Deactivated
successOverlay.description:
The credential has been deactivated and is no longer valid. 
To renew, please request it again.

errorOverlay.title: Revoke Credential
errorOverlay.description: The revocation of the credential was unsuccessful. Please contact the administrator or try again later.

deleteCompany.title: Delete Company Account
deleteCompany.description: You have initiated the deletion of the company account {{companyName}} incl. your personal user account {{name}}. Please note that the deletion can not get reversed.
deleteCompany.heading2: All linked user accounts are getting deleted:
deleteCompany.successDescription: The deletion was successful. You can now close this page. An email confirmation was send.
deleteCompany.errorDescription: The deletion was unsuccessful. Try it again or contact the platform administrator.
deleteCompany.notSupportedTitle: Company account deletion is not supported. You registration is already submitted/closed. To unsubscribe you need to use the platform off-boarding process.
deleteCompany.notSupportedDescription: You can close the screen now or redirect to the portal >> get to the platform

companyData.label: Company Data
companyData.descriptionAddress:
View your address information below. Use the 'Edit' button to make changes.
Note: After saving, your data will be revalidated by the Golden Record Service.
companyData.descriptionSite:
View your site information below. Use the 'Edit' button to make changes.
Note: After saving, your data will be revalidated by the Golden Record Service.

upload.title: Upload CSV
upload.fileSizeError: Uploaded file is too big. Maximum 1MB is allowed
upload.successDescription: CSV Upload is success. Please close the modal to see updated list
upload.note: Note: Please upload only CSV files with maximum 1 MB.
upload.errorDescription: CSV Upload failed with the following erros
upload.emptyError: Uploaded CSV is empty. Kindly check and upload again

table.title: Your Sites
table.noRowsMsg: No site added yet. After submitting site information, data will be validated by the Cofinity-X Golden Record Service.

site.title: Add new site
site.description: Please enter your site information (e.g., plant, warehouse, office) below. Click 'Submit' to provide your data for the Golden Record validation process. After approval, a BPNS will be generated for access by other Catena-X participants. You can monitor the status and edit your data on the main page.
site.editDescription: After saving, your data will be revalidated by the BPDM process.

errorGroup.errorDescription: to prevent further errors in the re-validation, please make sure that your site information:
errorGroup.error1: does not contain natural person information
errorGroup.error2: is not part of a country that is not allowed to be processed by the GR process (example: Brazil)
errorGroup.error3: does not contain unknown special characters

address.title: Create new address
address.description: Please enter your address information below. Click 'Submit' to provide your data for the Golden Record validation process. After approval, a BPNS will be generated for access by other Catena-X participants. You can monitor the status and edit your data on the main page.
address.editDescription: After saving, your data will be revalidated by the BPDM process.

success.title: {name} information submitted for validation
success.description: Your site data will now be processed by the Cofinity-X Golden Record Service. This can take up to 48 hours. You can monitor the status on the main page. If adjustments to your data are necessary, click the 'Details' button to view or edit your information. Please note, editing your data will restart the validation process.

error.title: Create {name}
error.description: The changes could not be saved. Please try again

pageHeader.title: Your company
pageHeader.description: View your company details and roles in Catena-X. Add site information for Cofinity-X Golden Record Service validation. Successful validated details, including BPNS and site address, will be shared with Business Partner Explorer subscribers for enhanced data quality.

onboardingServiceProvider.desc: Configure new identity providers to enable your own login mask for customer authentication. Add, manage, and monitor identity providers and keep track of the onboarding status of your onboarded companies.

callbackUrl.name: Callback URL
callbackUrl.hint: Enter the callback URL from your IDP that ends with '/.well-known/openid-configuration'

clientId.name: Client ID
clientId.hint: Enter the client ID provided by your IdP

clientSecret.name: Client Secret
clientSecret.hint: Enter the client secret provided by your IdP

onboardingServiceProvider.search: Geben Sie einen Namen oder Alias ​​ein, um zu suchen

field.lastNameHelper: Please provide a valid last name
